name: Pear Tree Inn and Country Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perhaps they were having a bad weekend but we booked here for a weekend on the way home from Cheltenham on the basis of the positive reviews and were very disappointed.
reviews.title: Having a bad weekend

reviews.text: On the positive side, the hotel is very conveniently located near the M5 and Worcester and all the staff we saw were polite and cheerful. The room was in a reasonable decorative state and everything in the room worked, except as mentioned below.
reviews.title: Party night

reviews.text: However, the negatives are regrettably more numerous:
reviews.title: Good hotel, poorly managed

reviews.text: - The secondary double glazing was ineffective, so given the wind direction it felt draughty and we heard the continuous roar of motorway traffic from the M5 a few hundred yards away;
reviews.title: A great place for a family party

reviews.text: - The hotel experienced failure of a pump in their water system, with the result that for an evening we had no water, could not flush toilets or shower, etc. I had to go down to Reception to ask what was going on. Why didn't the receptionist tell us as we came in?
reviews.title: Warning. Do not go to the party nights!
